verses.roman:
tathāpi eteka anna khāona nā yāya
bhaṭṭa kahe,--jāni, khāo yateka yuyāya

synonyms: tathāpi—still; eteka—so much; anna—food; khāona—eating; nā yāya—is not possible; bhaṭṭa kahe—Bhaṭṭācārya said; jāni—I know; khāo—You can eat; yateka—how much; yuyāya—is possible.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu then said, "There is so much food here that it is impossible to eat." Bhaṭṭācārya replied,"I know how much You can eat.
